description: Silverjuke is a mature application loaded with lots of features. I like how you can search for a cover image on the web and save it in one click.
summary: Nice music player with lots of features

description: Best navigation for big music library.good interface.
Beautiful, clean and simple layout. Just what you want from a music player.
best i have tried

I had been struggling to add music files from another drive to the library, so I came looking, read the reviews and installed Silverjuke. Not only was it easy to add files (just drop the folder in the panel) it is beautiful!! Greatest think since sliced bread.

I must have tried out more than 15 apps. They wouldn't " See " my storage drive, were overly complicated or plan didn't work.
This one loads my music folder and let's me made and save a playlist with no drama. Read the instructions after I set it up and seen a few things I may try out but hey I am happy now so may not fool with it.
summary: Try this one! Bet it works first time

description: good app thanks
summary: i like it simple to use not complicated like some players basic

description: installing it said it had a corrupted file from a previous installation ? it tells you nowhere how to use it, and would not even play a playlist.
summary: buggy and does not have docs

description: I tried several different players that were horrible. I am beyond satisfied with this feature rich beauty.

It takes a different approach to most audio players, and it works. It's good looking, easy to operate and instinctive. It makes creating a play queue very easy. It also loaded my entire music server, the product of thirty years of CD collecting, in just under a minute and a half on an old computer. I'm impressed.
summary: So far, I really like it

description: A feature i was looking, for a long time.To combine songs into the artist, where there was less than 3 songs within the same album. No more scattered 1 album and 1 song. Thanks

Is cool how the library works and the skins are cool as well
I couldn't find an option to customize the behavior of the double click, casue I like play at once instead of queue.
summary: Is great, I'll wait for enhancements

description: Tried lots of players over the years and I like the simple interface and good design
Best Karaoke player for linux. I love the Kiosk mode.

Programers, don't complicate your apps. This kind of apps I look for long time. Thank you for this easy, clean and simple app but also, this app have everything what you need and work perfect. Thank you
simple and great. more skins would be nice.
It has a beautiful clean design with different themes, ease of use and many useful features such as equalization and visual effects in the style of Windows Media Player.

Stumbled across SilverJuke and decided to try it alongside several other music apps. The interface blows away the others, and both it's ease and flexibility is superb. I dual boot to Ubuntu and Windows (depending on what I need to do that day), and have a large music collection on a data drive accessible by either OS. The playlists are usuable by SilverJuke when installed on either OS. Perfect.
summary: The music app I've been looking for all along

description: There's much I like about iTunes and Silverjuke has all that plus a vast amount more, all in an app that's easy to learn and use as-is but even better it's easy to tweak. It imported my medium-large music library in seconds! Interfaces on the many other Linux music players I've tried are either geeky complex or more opaque and annoying than Apple's stuff. After only a couple of hours I'm already so happy with it, sampling other Linux apps seems pointless. My only wish now is that it had a Visualization options actually pleasing to leave on, like iTunes has. The only thing I need to figure out now is how to import my Ratings and Play Counts, but it looks like there's plenty online about importing those to Linux apps in general.
summary: Excellent as-is, Outstanding after an hour tweaking!

description: Leaving Windows for Ubuntu 20. I was trying to find a good replacement for WinAmp which I dearly loved for many years. This is it. This player is intuitive and simple to learn. I like this much better than Audacious and Foobar.
summary: Intuitive and simple. I love it!

description: wasn't sold on the aesthetic at first but I love how it works
not all functions work , so so pure

Ein Übersichtliches und gut zu verstehendes Menü. 
Dieser Medienplayer hat alles was andere noch suche. 
Absolut empfehlenswert ! :-)
summary: Sehr gut, auch für Einsteiger / Anfänger / usw

description: Sehr übersichtlich und einfach zu bedienen!
Excelente reproductor

No hay que comer ansias, conoce el producto y te encantara, reproduce edita las caratulas de tus discos al reproducir la música en forma continua, empalmando las canciones, como si escucharas una estación de radio
Excelente diseño y funcionalidad. Me encanta
Esta buena y es funcional, lo malo es que tiene pocos skins
Appli limpide qui permet de lire la musique individuellement ou en playlist.

J'ai essayé bcp de lecteurs/gestionnaires de bilbliothèques musicales (Clementine, Gmusicbrowser, Lollypop ...) puis j'ai découvert par hasard SilverJuke. Simple, Efficace presque parfait !
SilverJuke mérite d'être plus connu.
Искал простой плеер на подобии Aimp как в Windows , но к сожалению это не тот вариант , конечно у кого проблем с Английским нет , можете по юзать ...
